actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary..

official_title: A bill to amend th Omnibus Crime Control and Safe Streets Act of 1968 to provide a Federal minimum death and dismemberment benefit to public safety officers or their surviving dependents.

summary.text: Public Safety Officers' Benefits Act - Provides, under the Omnibus Crime and Safe Streets Act of 1968, for a Federal minimum death and dismemberment benefit for public safety officers, or their surviving dependents, in the amount of $50,000. Specifies the order of payment of such benefit to survivors.

titles.title: A bill to amend th Omnibus Crime Control and Safe Streets Act of 1968 to provide a Federal minimum death and dismemberment benefit to public safety officers or their surviving dependents.
